price: Akasema: Msiogope! Hakika Mimi ni pamoja nanyi. Nasikia na ninaona.
arabic: قَالَ لَا تَخَافَآۖ إِنَّنِي مَعَكُمَآ أَسۡمَعُ وَأَرَىٰ

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qāla lā takhāfā innanī maʿakumā asmaʿu wa-arā
